### adjustTripCount() {#a9148aa93f4f29a103b42f649b1111029}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>void anonymous&#95;namespace&#123;ARMBaseInstrInfo.cpp&#125;::ARMPipelinerLoopInfo::adjustTripCount (int TripCountAdjust)</>}
  labels = {["inline", "virtual"]}>
Modify the loop such that the trip count is OriginalTC + TripCountAdjust.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armbaseinstrinfo-cpp/#l06852">6852</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armbaseinstrinfo-cpp">ARMBaseInstrInfo.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### createTripCountGreaterCondition() {#a2afe54a3f381a7c3f67db172f886d734}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>std::optional&lt; bool &gt; anonymous&#95;namespace&#123;ARMBaseInstrInfo.cpp&#125;::ARMPipelinerLoopInfo::createTripCountGreaterCondition (int TC, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a> &amp; MBB, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl">SmallVectorImpl</a>&lt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineoperand">MachineOperand</a> &gt; &amp; Cond)</>}
  labels = {["inline", "virtual"]}>
Create a condition to determine if the trip count of the loop is greater than TC, where TC is always one more than for the previous prologue or 0 if this is being called for the outermost prologue.

If the trip count is statically known to be greater than TC, return true. If the trip count is statically known to be not greater than TC, return false. Otherwise return nullopt and fill out Cond with the test condition.

Note: This hook is guaranteed to be called from the innermost to the outermost prologue of the loop being software pipelined.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armbaseinstrinfo-cpp/#l06818">6818</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armbaseinstrinfo-cpp">ARMBaseInstrInfo.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### setPreheader() {#a721de7034ec951de838d61e00e999fac}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>void anonymous&#95;namespace&#123;ARMBaseInstrInfo.cpp&#125;::ARMPipelinerLoopInfo::setPreheader (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a> &#42; NewPreheader)</>}
  labels = {["inline", "virtual"]}>
Called when the loop&#39;s preheader has been modified to NewPreheader.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armbaseinstrinfo-cpp/#l06850">6850</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armbaseinstrinfo-cpp">ARMBaseInstrInfo.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### shouldIgnoreForPipelining() {#a2047faa6dfe2d5079943c56bee1df749}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>bool anonymous&#95;namespace&#123;ARMBaseInstrInfo.cpp&#125;::ARMPipelinerLoopInfo::shouldIgnoreForPipelining (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &#42; MI) const</>}
  labels = {["inline", "virtual"]}>
Return true if the given instruction should not be pipelined and should be ignored.

An example could be a loop comparison, or induction variable update with no users being pipelined.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armbaseinstrinfo-cpp/#l06806">6806</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armbaseinstrinfo-cpp">ARMBaseInstrInfo.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### shouldUseSchedule() {#aa7630c91a3f73521e2a614082452e838}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>bool anonymous&#95;namespace&#123;ARMBaseInstrInfo.cpp&#125;::ARMPipelinerLoopInfo::shouldUseSchedule (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/swingschedulerdag">SwingSchedulerDAG</a> &amp; SSD, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smschedule">SMSchedule</a> &amp; SMS)</>}
  labels = {["inline", "virtual"]}>
Return true if the proposed schedule should used.

Otherwise return false to not pipeline the loop. This function should be used to ensure that pipelined loops meet target-specific quality heuristics.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armbaseinstrinfo-cpp/#l06811">6811</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armbaseinstrinfo-cpp">ARMBaseInstrInfo.cpp</a>.
